Stairwell Pressurisation
sections.PROJECT:
is to resolve and find necessary solution to sort out the issue 
caused in SAFOP CNC lathe machine. The problem that occurred in the machine is a 
vacuum being created between the brake shoes .So, due to this there will be a variation 
in the load cell. In order to avoid, a slot is made between the brake shoe to exit the 
vacuum. The brake shoe is made of brass material. The solution is found out by doing 
the root cause analysis method in the SAFOP CNC lathe machine.
